titles: A new account of East-India and Persia, in eight letters being nine years travels begun 1672 and finished 1681 : containing observations made of the moral, natural and artifical estate of those countries ... / by John Fryer ... ; illustrated with maps, figures and useful tables.
author: Fryer, John, d. 1733.
publisher: Printed by R.R. for Ri. Chiswell ...,
notes: Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
